website_summaries.verdict: A large, stylish set of nail-art rhinestones. Perfect for those who already own the essential tools.
pros: Kit includes over 2,000 rhinestones in varying colors, shapes, and designs
All stones are flat bottomed and easy to stick on
Works on fake and natural nails
Stones have a quality shine to them
Large rhinestones are perfect for those who love a little bling
cons: Kit doesn't include tweezers or any essential nail art tools

customer_reviews.title: A must-have
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I ordered these I have been looking for different size stones that are not too big and these fits the bill! The larger stones are not too large I think they are just right. Will definitely be ordering again fast delivery and great customer service you cannot go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous stones! I tried to take a good pic but it doesn’t do them justice, very blingy crystals not like regular “rhinestones”. They have a true Swarovski shine
customer_reviews.author: Jay Fresh

customer_reviews.title: They’re pretty okay
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute and pretty. Some of the larger pieces are a little crooked. I also don’t like how for some of the gems there’s only one. Usually when I do an accent nail i do it on both hands and would like to use the same gems. They’re a little overpriced as well in my opinion. But they’re pretty and the rhinestones come in a good selection of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Williams

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I didn’t expect these to look that good, but they are very pretty. I think you get a lot for the price. The only thing I didn’t like was the same as a lot of other people had said; the big gems are not matching pairs. But I would definitely purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MrsBubG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Every stone with this order was worth the money. I love the shine on these stones.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Mali The Creator

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful 😍 I loved them . I recommend it. This is exactly what I was looking for and I got exactly what I ordered. I will be buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Worth it 💯
customer_reviews.text: Love these gems soo much they have a lovely shine ... bigger gems were a little hard to use at first with just glue ( I used gem tact and my Mia secret nail glue ) but using a builder gel then applying the gems right after then cure for 60-90 seconds will fix that problem 😁 Follow my ig for more pics and vids @AniAriArtistry 💫
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Charms...eh, rhinestones are bomb though!!!
customer_reviews.text: The charms are very cute but much smaller than i had initially thought. Some stones are crooked and some are a bit dull. The rhinestones on the other hand are amazing though! Haven't used them yet but just looking from the plastic bag, it glitters beautifully. Can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely buy again! These pieces last and made my nails look soo professional
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I will buy again! I used them to glam up my fake nails and they are just as expected. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful on my nails. Had it on for 2 weeks and the color remained true
customer_reviews.author: Haiti C

customer_reviews.title: It sparkles!!
customer_reviews.text: These crystals actually sparkle and not like your typical acrylic embellishments that appears dull. I put this on my real nails using resin glue. It's amazing. So far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love them they was just what I needed!!! A must buy
customer_reviews.author: kenyata

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy them again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Talk about beautiful nail gems! These are sparkly, well made and have a curved back to fit on the nail better.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These charms are gorgrous! They’re also curved to sit on the nail if you put the charm right down the middle of the nail. They don’t look inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these for nail art they are good quality and looks so cute
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Best nail crystals I have used. The variety in sizes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Tha small gems are nice but the big gems are a bigno no. Some of them weren’t even flat at all for me to glue on the nail. I had to use a flat head to try and flatten them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Janny

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Amazing my nails are show stoppers i gave out the information in the bank,market also my customers at work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The gems are so pretty. I got more than I thought I was.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy C.

customer_reviews.title: Bling bling
customer_reviews.text: Love love love i am a nail tech and use these all the time
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bling
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the finished look of these. They are very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Jachi

customer_reviews.title: Okay set.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the larger jewels fell out upon opening. I had to glue them back in.
customer_reviews.author: Riva Jay

customer_reviews.title: They’re perfect 😍!!️
customer_reviews.text: The gems are EVERYTHING! They glisten so nicely. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful selection and easy to work with. Very slightly curved to better fit the nail and STAY PUT. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Bling Yourself!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo....I purchase this under my husband's acct ...and doing the review. This product is bomb.com so far ....shipping was perfect....it came in the package as seen on pic...i sorted them into a old nail container i had..bling bling bling! I apply all my jewels with just top coat..they didnt fade or dinge out which was my main concern....overall I'm stacking up on these....will order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Royal Manuels

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bling!
customer_reviews.text: This are so pretty that I couldn't wait to use them! They stayed on very well. I use nail glue first then no wipe top coat, placed the jewel and then cure for 2 minutes. It's not going anywhere! Lol🤗😍 Learned that from a YouTube video from Nail Career Education! She's the best!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki72

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used the big pieces yet because they are huge and heavy and I need to figure out the best way to place them but they are BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.author: KwnCora

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The gems are way larger than I expected. Not really functional for nails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, and are good quality. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: The rhinestones are super pretty and sparkly. If you are planning to put these on your nails, I 100% recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A plus
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I use them for arts and crafts embellishments
customer_reviews.author: CJ

product_meta.title: 2030 Pieces 3D Crystal AB Color Flat Back Rhinestones Nail Art DIY Crafts Gemstones with Nail Art Gem Stones (Shiny and Colorful Style)
product_meta.description:
Good charming decorations for your nail: 
2030 Pieces 3D nail rhinestones, rich color and mixed size, meet your various kinds of demands, good for DIY various kinds of nail art and crafts. 

Crystal ab color flat back rhinestones: 
Total 2000 pieces in 6 different sizes, include 1.6 mm (288 pieces), 1.8 mm (288 pieces), 2 mm (560 pieces), 2.4 mm (288 pieces), 2.8 mm (288 pieces), 3 mm (288 pieces). 

3D nail art rhinestones crystal glass metal gem stones: 
30 Pieces studs nail tips for nail art DIY, 18 different kinds of nail rhinestones, each manicure alloy glass stones has a base for easy applying to a true nail or fake nail, making your nails in different styles and more glitter. 

How to use: 
Clean the surface of your nails; 
Brush the base with polish; 
Place the rhinestones onto your nails with tweezers.(Tweezers and nail polish are not included.) 

Package includes: 
30 x Alloy rhinestone nail decorations 
2000 x Crystal AB color flatback gem stones
feature_bullets: Colorful nail art rhinestones: package contains 2030 pieces multicolor nail glass rhinestones, which includes 2000 pieces mixed sizes crystal ab rhinestones and 30 pieces multicolor nail alloy rhinestones, abundant colors and quantities can meet your diverse needs
6 Sizes crystal ab round gemstones: total 2000 pieces, 1.6 mm, 1.8 mm, 2 mm, 2.4 mm, 2.8 mm, 3 mm, the number of 2 mm gem stone is about 560 pieces, and the others are about 288 pieces for each size
30 Pieces multicolors alloy rhinestones: 18 different styles of alloy rhinestone, each alloy glass stones has a base for easy applying to a true nail or fake nail

Specially designed and precise cut: flat bottomed stones are precise cut, it reflects the charming bright luster, make your nails shine, eye-catching, different designs make your nails in different styles and more glitter, also good for DIY scrapbooking crafts, jewelry making
Suitable for salon or home use: fits for natural and false nails, suit to use on top of the nail polish, nail gel, soak off gel, etc.
